text: One Blackfriars is a skyscraper in London located at No. 1 Blackfriars Road in Bankside. It has 52 floors and 274 apartments, a hotel and retail shops. The building is tall. It is also known as The Vase or The Boomerang due to its shape. == Design == The shape was inspired by the shape of glass vase Lansetti designed by Timo Sarpaneva in 1952. == Construction == Construction of the tower started in 2013. It includes 13 studio houses, 78 one bedroom houses, 120 two bedroom houses, 56 three bedroom houses, 6 four bedroom houses and 1 three apartment house. The tower was finished in 2019. == References == Category:Skyscrapers in the United Kingdom Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Southwark
title: One Blackfriars
